xes

Class XESFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • xes.XESFormatter

  • public class XESFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the required format of the tags, extensions, classifiers and keys according to XES standard.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XESFormatter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String addClassifier(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String keys)
      Returns a string that consists of adding a classifier.
      static java.lang.String addExtension(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String uri)
      Returns a string that consists of adding an extension.
      static java.lang.String addKey(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String attribute, java.lang.String value)
      Returns a string that consists of adding a key.
      static java.lang.String addTabs(int n)
      Returns a string that consists of tabs required to indent the lines.
      static java.lang.String beginEvent()
      Returns a string that consists of opening the event tag.
      static java.lang.String beginFile()
      Returns a string that consists of the xml version and encoding used, the opening log tag that marks the start of the event log and the xes version and features.
      static java.lang.String beginGlobalScope(java.lang.String scope)
      Returns a string that consists of opening the global scope tag.
      static java.lang.String beginTrace()
      Returns a string that consists of opening the trace tag.
      static java.lang.String endEvent()
      Returns a string that consists of closing the event tag.
      static java.lang.String endFile()
      Returns a string that consists of closing the trace and log tags.
      static java.lang.String endGlobalScope()
      Returns a string that consists of closing the global scope tag.
      static java.lang.String endTrace()
      Returns a string that consists of closing the trace tag.

      • beginFile

        public static java.lang.String beginFile()
        Returns a string that consists of the xml version and encoding used, the opening log tag that marks the start of the event log and the xes version and features.
        Returns:
        start of file tags

      • endFile

        public static java.lang.String endFile()
        Returns a string that consists of closing the trace and log tags.
        Returns:
        closing trace and log tags

      • addExtension

        public static java.lang.String addExtension(java.lang.String name,
                                            java.lang.String prefix,
                                            java.lang.String uri)
        Returns a string that consists of adding an extension. An extension comprises a name, a prefix and an uri.
        Parameters:
        name - name of extension
        prefix - prefix of extension
        uri - uri of extension
        Returns:
        extension string

      • beginGlobalScope

        public static java.lang.String beginGlobalScope(java.lang.String scope)
        Returns a string that consists of opening the global scope tag.
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope, can be trace or event
        Returns:
        starting global scope tag

      • endGlobalScope

        public static java.lang.String endGlobalScope()
        Returns a string that consists of closing the global scope tag.
        Returns:
        closing global scope tag

      • addKey

        public static java.lang.String addKey(java.lang.String type,
                                      java.lang.String attribute,
                                      java.lang.String value)
        Returns a string that consists of adding a key. A key comprises a type, an attribute and a value.
        Parameters:
        type - data type of key
        attribute - attribute of type
        value - value of attribute
        Returns:
        key line

      • addClassifier

        public static java.lang.String addClassifier(java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.String keys)
        Returns a string that consists of adding a classifier. A classifier comprises of a name and keys.
        Parameters:
        name - name of classifier
        keys - keys used for classifying
        Returns:
        classifier line

      • addTabs

        public static java.lang.String addTabs(int n)
        Returns a string that consists of tabs required to indent the lines. It takes as input an int n and adds to string n tabs characters.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of tabs
        Returns:
        tab string
